author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Warrior Met Coal Launches Proposed Offering Of $125 Mln Of Additional 8% Senior Secured Notes
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Warrior Met Coal Inc:
* WARRIOR MET COAL LAUNCHES PROPOSED OFFERING OF $125 MILLION OF ADDITIONAL 8.00% SENIOR SECURED NOTES
* WARRIOR MET COAL - ‍ PROPOSES TO OFFER $125 MILLION AMOUNT OF 8.00% SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2024 IN A PRIVATE OFFERING​
* WARRIOR MET COAL - TO USE PROCEEDS OF OFFERING, WITH CASH ON HAND, TO PAY ONE OR MORE DIVIDENDS OF UP TO $350 MILLION TO STOCKHOLDERS ON A PRO RATA BASIS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
